reviews.content: Transparency stopped working in this update, v1.1
Crash setting when try changing color within « mercury » tweak message

Works on :  
iPadPro 12.9 1st, iOS 14.2.0, checkra1n 0.12.2
Sources Manager = CSources2
Repo : https://DirtyBeans.github.io

Now working perfectly, i was initially having an issue on v1.1.1, I contacted the dev and in a few hours the package recived an update to fix the probkem.

I’m supper happy!
No transparency slider don’t recommend until complete
